amendment.description: To set aside an amount for reconstituting the B-1B bomber aircraft fleet of the Air Force.

vote.text: Amendment SA 791 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 791 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S6892, S6893-6894; text: CR S6892; text as modified: CR S6893) To set aside an amount for reconstituting the B-1B bomber aircraft fleet of the Air Force.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 791 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Daschle.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 791 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
